content: hi everyone today i m excited to share this free valentine s bear crochet pattern with you this tiny bear holding a sweet little heart is quick to make full of charm and perfect for celebrating love in a handmade way whether you re crocheting for valentine s day a special gift or simply because you love small and adorable projects this little bear is sure to melt hearts designed to work up fast with minimal sewing this pattern is ideal for using up small amounts of yarn and makes a lovely last-minute gift market item or thoughtful surprise despite its small size the valentine s bear is full of personality and sweetness
